meanings.definition: The act of creating a lithograph.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the lithoing process in art class.
meanings.sent2: The lithoing of the image onto the stone was meticulous work.
meanings.sent3: The lithoing of her favorite painting made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His lithoing skills were as precise as a surgeon's hand.
meanings.sent5: Watching the lithoing in action was like witnessing magic on paper.

meanings.definition: The process of printing from a smooth surface.
meanings.sent1: The lithoing of the design onto the paper was flawless.
meanings.sent2: They learned about lithoing in their graphic design class.
meanings.sent3: The printer had a dream about lithoing and woke up smiling.
meanings.sent4: Her lithoing technique was smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The lithoing machine hummed softly as it worked its printing magic.
